description:
Not only has Team Taiyo already defeated Crow and Jack, but they also have Zushin the Sleeping Giant - one of the most powerful monsters in all of Duel Monsters!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shinjiru Chikara! Saikyou no Kyojin Thud vs Shooting Star Dragon
The Power to Believe! The Strongest Giant Thud vs Shooting Star Dragon
信じる力! 最強の巨人ズシンVSシューティング・スター・ドラゴン
